sentence: The standard rooms were nice enough I was not quite sure they were five stars but the suites were very good
Very relaxing and international place
First of all it is a stunning place with exotic birds
The hotel was lovely and very clean
My Wife and children are very happy

We had a sea view room which was good lovely and quietSports bar staff thanks for service with a smile and having time to chat to usVincent on the beach always ready with the umbrelasPol attendants and pool bar staff very efficient too many to mention who served usOnly remark to make would be the hotel rooms looking dated now and no balconies however we heard a rumour they may be renovating Thanks to you all we will be back for winter sun next year
The stay at Ja Jebel Ali Beach Hotel was outstanding in every way
Swimming Pools Long Sandy Beach and Crystal Clear waters 9 hole Golf Course as well as Crazy Golf Horse Riding Shooting Club Sports Bar I could go on and on
Top notch great service quick effective and always around to support
My son enjoyed our stay there tremendously as well
visit on all inc and actually left the hotel a wee bit disappointed after the build up on social media
Dubai 3rd time
I asked if we could upgrade to a Sea view and was told not now come back later

I had specifically booked the sea view room because that is what I wanted but instead was given a room that was on ground floor with no sea view and was unusually darker and with lot of outside people noise given it proximity to the garden Room 901
I wish there were more options to eat
I had to go to my room to call Arabian Adventures to confirm pick up
Very dusty despite the fact that cleaners have been on site every day
Could you please check in your Lost and found section and contact me on br … if you do find it
Booked the All Inclusive package however what was not clear at the time of booking is that there is 3 levels of All Inclusive some restaurants are not included in the All Inclusive package
We arrive at 5 am at the hôtel et nobody could give us a room before 3 pm it ’s totally unacceptable
